summary.span: 取得作業所完成的目前工作量。

span.span: Gets the current amount of work done by the operation.

summary.span: 這個值永遠小於或等於 。

span.span: This is always less than or equal to .

value.span: 傳回 值，表示目前已經由作業完成的工作量。

span.span: Returns an value representing the current amount of work already completed by the operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 屬性值Property Value 整數，代表目前作業已完成的工作量。An integer representing the current amount of work already completed by the operation. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
